item.title: Mathematical puzzle to train the programmer brain Q03 Turn over the card
item.description: # Problem overview The first card is 100 cards, the first card is every other card, the second card is every two cards, and so on. #Code #Q03 Turn over the card cards0 = [-1]*100 #First. 1=front, -1=back cards = [-1, 1]*50 # second step = 3 # How many sheets to turn over Turn the card over every #step. End when there are no cards to turn over while cards0 !
